name: share
description: ethereum peer-to-peer rewards platform with charitable contributions

scripts.test: concurrently --names "UI,API" "npm run test --prefix ui" "npm run test --prefix api"
scripts.build: concurrently --names "UI,API" "yarn install --prefix ui" "npm run install --prefix api"
scripts.start: concurrently --names "UI,API" "yarn start --prefix ui" "npm run start --prefix api"
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "UI,API" "npm run start --prefix ui" "npm run dev --prefix api"

author: Daniel Escobar
